title: STUCK IN LOADING SCREEN. CAN'T CONNECT.
body:
please .. just please .. this is happening now for like the 7th or 8th time in 3 months.
im slowly giving up on this game due to the massive amount of bugs. fix your servers!

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is having a hard time connecting to the game server. Most of the time this is directly caused by network settings that prevent a good link from happening. I strongly recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a starting point in troubleshooting this.

Let me know if those steps helped.

I already walked through all of these, and I still have the same problem.
And I also tried the hextech repair tool, including repaching and reinstalling the game .. None of that helped either.
Thank you though, that's it for me, I'm done.

In that case, the issue is likely something we'll need to find in your system logs. To do that, I recommend [running a set of logs](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our tech specialists can work with you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
I already uninstalled the game, never gonna recommend it to anyone .. thanks for nothing.
